description:
Since the transfer of the new coach fell through, four of the 1st year boys decide to move on to the senior league. That means there are only three new members for the Fuurin baseball team, one boy, Nishina, and two girls from the famous Yokohama Little team, Anita and Chisato. They just managed to scrape together 9 members when they find out that their first public tournament is only two weeks away. Excited about the real matches coming up, catcher Anita immediately lays into Daigo that Mutsuko and Nishina as pitchers are not sufficient.
Source: crunchyroll
